institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training project operation rules/Article 38 (open contest and selection of accounting settlement performers)
contents: Article 38 (Public contest and selection of accounting settlement performers) ① In order to ensure fair and transparent execution of support funds, the Chairman shall public contest and select a person who will be exclusively responsible for accounting settlement work for the project group. However, any person who falls under any of the following items cannot perform accounting settlement work: 1. Internal and external management evaluation committee members related to the corporation's business, 2. Certified public accountants of the corporation, 3. Persons exclusively responsible for the corporation's accounting audit 4. An accounting firm dedicated to auditing business group accounting, ② The chairman of the board shall enter into a business agreement with the person selected in accordance with paragraph 1, and the business group shall notify the selection of the person responsible for accounting settlement, etc., ③ The chairman of the board must enter into a business agreement with the person selected pursuant to paragraph 1 and inform the business group of the selection of accounting settlement performer, etc. A contract must be signed between joint training centers and accounting settlement must be received. However, if the business agreement concluded between the Corporation and the accounting firm is judged to be sufficiently binding, the conclusion of the contract may be omitted.
